name: Friday
description:
A girl named Friday loves to collect skulls. The zombies they belong to are not ready to part with them. Gather your collection of exceptional skulls.

Friday - Top Down game, which is not so easy to win. You have to collect the skulls in the trunk of the car. Giant hands and zombies can be a big problem. Use bombs and kill zombies. Today your collection of skulls will replenish quickly

Game Features:
-Pixel Art
- Pleasant musical accompaniment
- Lots of levels
- Difficult passage
